pages.text: 100|10|aur seenon ke bhed prakaash mein laaye jaayenge
100|11|nishchay unaka paalanahaar us din unase poorn roop se soochit hoga.
101|1|vah khadakhada dene vaalee.
101|2|kya hai vah khadakha dene vaalee
101|3|aur tum kya jaano ki vah khadakhada dene vaalee kya hai
101|4|jis din log, bikhare patingon ke samaan (vyaakool) honge.
101|5|aur parvat, dhunee huee oon ke samaan udenge.
101|6|to jisake palade bhaaree hue
101|7|to vah manachaahe sukh mein hoga.
101|8|tatha jisake palad halke hue
101|9|to usaka sthaan haaviya hai.
101|10|aur tum kya jaano ki vah (haaviya) kya hai
101|11|vah dahaktee aag hai.
102|1|tumhen adhik (dhan) ke lobh ne magan kar diya.
102|2|yahaan tak ki tum qabristaan ja pahunche.
102|3|nishchay tumhen gyaan ho jaayega.
102|4|phir nishchay hee tumhen gyaan ho jaayega.
102|5|vaastav mein, yadi tumhen vishvaas hota (to aisa na karate).
102|6|tum narak ko avashy dekhoge.
102|7|phir use vishvaas kee aankh se dekhoge.
102|8|phir us din tumase sukh sampada ke vishay mein avashy poochh gachh hogee.
